authErrors.noUserFound: There is no user record corresponding to this email address.
authErrors.wrongPassword: The password is invalid or the user does not have a password
authErrors.weakPassword: The password provided is too weak
authErrors.accountAlreadyExist: The account already exists for that email
authErrors.accountExistWithSameEmail: An account already exists with the same email address but different front-in credentials. Sign in in using a provider associated with this email address
authErrors.googleSignInFailed: Failed to front in with Google.
authErrors.facebookSignInFailed: Failed to front in with Facebook.
authErrors.facebookSignInCanceled: Failed to front in with Facebook.
authErrors.tooManyRequests: Too many requests to verify the email. Please try again in a while
authErrors.unauthorized: User is not authorized to perform the desired action

auth.confirmPasswordNotMatching: Password and confirm password are not matching
